thread.title: Munck Wilson Mandala Expands Technology Practice
thread.title_full: Munck Wilson Mandala Expands Technology Practice

author: admin
title: Munck Wilson Mandala Expands Technology Practice
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Munck Wilson Mandala 
DALLAS, Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Dallas-based technology law firm, Munck Wilson Mandala , announces the addition of Dr. Changhoi Koo to the Firm's Intellectual Property and Technology Practice Group. 
"Dr. Koo brings extensive experience in patent preparation and prosecution in the electrical arts, particularly in wireless communication and core network technologies," said William A. Munck, Managing Partner of Munck Wilson Mandala. "He has several years of highly recognized experience in patent procurement and licensing, along with technical knowledge on the system development, research, standardization, and system engineering and architecture in various mobile broadband communication systems. He will be a knowledgeable and effective member of our team." 
Dr. Koo earned his Ph.D. from Kwangwoon University's Department of Electronics Communication Engineering in Seoul, Korea, following receipt of his Masters and Bachelor in Engineering degrees, respectively. Dr. Koo has provided more than 250 contributions for the standard meeting committees and is a named inventor on over 100 granted patents, along with authoring numerous international conference and journal papers. Dr. Koo's career included his tenure as a Senior Staff Engineer while at Samsung Electronics Korea, as well as a Principal Engineer and Director at Samsung Research America. 
Munck Wilson Mandala is a technology-focused law firm with offices in Dallas and Marshall, Texas, with an emphasis on patent, trade secret, trademark and other intellectual property disputes. The firm offers full-service counsel in the areas of intellectual property litigation, complex commercial litigation, intellectual property portfolio development, corporate transactions and securities, and employment law. Munck Wilson Mandala represents clients from start-ups to Fortune 50 companies. Learn more about the firm at http://www.munckwilson.com . 
For more information on Changhoi Koo or Munck Wilson Mandala, please contact Stephanie Peeler at 972-628-4523 or speeler@munckwilson.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/munck-wilson-mandala-expands-technology-practice-300162434.html 
SOURCE Munck Wilson Mandala
